create_connect

public int create_connect()
Description copied from class: Create
First step for connecting CBC to Create. This function puts the Create in the create_safe mode.

Overrides:
create_connect in class Create
Returns:
0 if sucessful and a negative number if not
See Also:

create_safe

public void create_safe()
Description copied from class: Create
Puts Create into safe mode. Create will execute all commands, but will disconnect and stop if drop or cliff sensors fire. This is recommended for practice, but not at a tournament.

Overrides:
create_safe in class Create
See Also:
Create.create_passive(), Create.create_full(), Create.create_mode()

create_full

public void create_full()
Description copied from class: Create
Puts Create into full mode. Create will move however you tell it -- even if that is a bad thing. In particular, the Create will not stop and disconnect, even if it is picked up or the cliff sensors fire. This is recommended for tournaments, but not for practice, due to its dangerous nature.

Overrides:
create_full in class Create
See Also:
Create.create_passive(), Create.create_safe(), Create.create_mode()

create_drive

public void create_drive(int speed,
                         int radius)
Description copied from class: Create
Drives in an arc.

Overrides:
create_drive in class Create
Parameters:
speed - range is 20-500mm/s
radius - radius in mm/s.

A radius of 32767 will drive the robot straight.

A radius of 1 will spin the robot CCW

A radius of -1 will spin the robot CW

Negative radii will be right turns, positive radii left turns

See Also:
Create.create_drive_straight(int)

create_drive_straight

public void create_drive_straight(int speed)
Description copied from class: Create
Drives straight at speed in mm/s

Overrides:
create_drive_straight in class Create
Parameters:
speed - 20-500mm/s

                                int l_speed)
Description copied from class: Create
Specifies individual left and right speeds in mm/s

Overrides:
create_drive_direct in class Create
Parameters:

l_speed - 20-500mm/s. Speed of left wheel.

create_spin_block

public int create_spin_block(int speed,
                             int angle)
Description copied from class: Create
This function blocks and does a pretty accurate spin. Note that the function will not return until the spin is complete CAUTION: requesting the robot to spin more than about 3600 degrees may never terminate

Overrides:
create_spin_block in class Create
Parameters:
speed - 20-500mm/s. Speed of edge (wheels) of bot.
angle - Angle in degrees to turn before returning.

CAUTION: requesting the robot to spin more than about 3600 degrees may never terminate

Returns:
-1 if error
See Also:
Create.create_spin_CW(int), Create.create_spin_CCW(int)

create_digital_output

public void create_digital_output(int bits)
Description copied from class: Create
This function sets the three digital out put pins 20,7,19 where 20 is the high bit and 19 is the low. You probably don't care about this function.

Overrides:
create_digital_output in class Create
Parameters:
bits - Should have a value 0 to 7.

create_pwm_low_side_drivers

public void create_pwm_low_side_drivers(int pwm2,
                                        int pwm1,
                                        int pwm0)
Description copied from class: Create
Sets the PWM signal for the three low side drivers (128 = 100%). You probably don't care about this function.

Overrides:
create_pwm_low_side_drivers in class Create
Parameters:
pwm2 - pin 24
pwm1 - pin 23
pwm0 - pin 22

create_low_side_drivers

public void create_low_side_drivers(int pwm2,
                                    int pwm1,
                                    int pwm0)
Description copied from class: Create
Turns on and off the signal for the three low side drivers (128 = 100%). A 0 or 1 should be given for each of the drivers to turn them off or on. You probably don't care about this function.

Overrides:
create_low_side_drivers in class Create
Parameters:
pwm2 - pin 24
pwm1 - pin 23
pwm0 - pin 22

create_load_song

public void create_load_song(int num)
Description copied from class: Create
This loads a song into the robot's memory. Song can be numbered 0 to 15. The first element in each row of the array should be the number of notes (1-16) the subsequent pairs of bytes should be tone and duration see the roomba SCI manual for note codes. User's program should load the song data into the array before calling this routine. Sets gc_song_array, an inaccessable variable. DO NOT USE THIS FUNCTION UNTIL THE ISSUE IS RESOLVED

Overrides:
create_load_song in class Create
Parameters:
num - Song can be numbered 0 to 15
See Also:
Create.create_play_song(int)

create_play_song

public void create_play_song(int num)
Description copied from class: Create
See the roomba SCI manual for note codes. Uses gc_song_array, an inaccessable variable. DO NOT USE THIS FUNCTION UNTIL THE ISSUE IS RESOLVED

Overrides:
create_play_song in class Create
Parameters:
num - Song can be numbered 0 to 15
See Also:
Create.create_load_song(int)
